name: Acalesia
description:
To play this game on PS5, your system may need to be updated to the latest system software. Although this game is playable on PS5, some features available on PS4 may be absent. See PlayStation.com/bc for more details.
Our attractive protagonist wishes for just two things — to save the princess and to become rich. Actually, he’s doing it just to get rich, but if the princess Celinda will be saved in the process, let’s consider it a nice bonus! To get all the treasures of Acalesia this hipster with a shotgun will have to fight hordes of monsters, sneak through a myriad of devious traps and reveal a few secrets of survival. Main features:

-Spectacular graphics with true retro-vibe and hand-made pixel art
-Memorable story about the end of Moedus reign and evil Hilmandel’s rise to power
-Trustworthy shotgun to shoot the dismal monsters of Acalesia kingdom
-Comfortable controls with easy-to-learn tasks
-Many secrets of Acalesia waiting just behind the next door


Offline single player
